attributes.additional_details:
Legalize cannabis with the same rules as alachol! (Unit Limits)
 before I get in to reasons Alcohol, Nicotine and even Caffeine are all a form of drugs. Which kill brain cells (scientifically proven) scientifically proven that smoking Marijuana does not kill brain cells.
 Deaths from Alcohol =millions Death from Marijuana =0 . You would have to smoke 26,000 Marijuana Cigarettes within 15 minutes to overdose. Marijuana is not addictive physically, it is only mentally addictive. It is a plant, found naturally.
- It has over 100 proven medicinal uses. Some people even claim it can cure cancer.
 There is an estimated 50,000 industrial uses for hemp in the world today. It can be used to make paper, It takes a few months to grow paper from hemp, It can be used to create biofuels. It can even be uses to create a part for the clutch of a car.
 It would create jobs, it would generate billions of pounds per year. Street dealers would be gone.
